verses.verse: וְעַתָּ֥ה <WH6258> ve-'at-Tah now שְׁמַ֖ע <WH8085> she-Ma' Yet now hear יַעֲקֹ֣ב <WH3290> ya-'a-Ko O Jacob עַבְדִּ֑י <WH5650> 'av-Di; my servant וְיִשְׂרָאֵ֖ל <WH3478> ve-Yis-ra-'El and Israel בָּחַ֥רְתִּי <WH977> ba-Char-ti whom I have chosen בֽוֹ׃ vo.

כֹּה־ <WH3541> koh- Thus אָמַ֨ר <WH559> 'a-Mar Thus saith יְהוָ֥ה <WH3068> Yah-weh the LORD עֹשֶׂ֛ךָ <WH6213> 'o-Se-cha that made וְיֹצֶרְךָ֥ <WH3335> ve-yo-tzer-Cha thee and formed מִבֶּ֖טֶן <WH990> mib-Be-ten thee from the womb יַעְזְרֶ֑ךָּ <WH5826> ya'-ze-Re-ka; [which] will help אַל־ <WH408> 'al- not תִּירָא֙ <WH3372> ti-Ra thee Fear עַבְדִּ֣י <WH5650> 'av-Di my servant יַֽעֲקֹ֔ב <WH3290> ya-'a-Ko, not O Jacob וִישֻׁר֖וּן <WH3484> vi-shu-Run and thou Jesurun בָּחַ֥רְתִּי <WH977> ba-Char-ti whom I have chosen בֽוֹ׃ vo.

כִּ֤י <WH3588> ki for אֶצָּק־ <WH3332> 'etz-tzok- For I will pour מַ֙יִם֙ <WH4325> ma-yim water עַל־ <WH5921> 'al- on צָמֵ֔א <WH6771> tza-Me, upon him that is thirsty וְנֹזְלִ֖ים <WH5140> ve-no-ze-Lim and floods עַל־ <WH5921> 'al- on יַבָּשָׁ֑ה <WH3004> yab-ba-Shah; upon the dry ground אֶצֹּ֤ק <WH3332> 'etz-Tzok I will pour רוּחִי֙ <WH7307> ru-Chi my spirit עַל־ <WH5921> 'al- upon זַרְעֶ֔ךָ <WH2233> zar-'E-cha, upon thy seed וּבִרְכָתִ֖י <WH1293> u-vir-cha-Ti and my blessing עַל־ <WH5921> 'al- on צֶאֱצָאֶֽיךָ׃ <WH6631> tze-'e-tza-'Ei-cha. upon thine offspring

וְצָמְח֖וּ <WH6779> ve-tza-me-Chu And they shall spring up בְּבֵ֣ין <WH996> be-Vein [as] among חָצִ֑יר <WH2682> cha-Tzir; the grass כַּעֲרָבִ֖ים <WH6155> ka-'a-ra-Vim as willows עַל־ <WH5921> 'al- by יִבְלֵי־ <WH2988> yiv-lei- courses מָֽיִם׃ <WH4325> Ma-yim. by the water

זֶ֤ה <WH2088> zeh This יֹאמַר֙ <WH559> yo-Mar One shall say לַֽיהוָ֣ה <WH3068> Yah-weh I [am] the LORD'S אָ֔נִי <WH589> 'A-ni, I וְזֶ֖ה <WH2088> ve-Zeh one יִקְרָ֣א <WH7121> yik-Ra and another shall call בְשֵֽׁם־ <WH8034> ve-shem- [himself] by the name יַעֲקֹ֑ב <WH3290> ya-'a-Ko; of Jacob וְזֶ֗ה <WH2088> ve-Zeh, and another יִכְתֹּ֤ב <WH3789> yich-To and another shall subscribe יָדוֹ֙ <WH3027> ya-Do [with] his hand לַֽיהוָ֔ה <WH3068> Yah-weh, unto the LORD וּבְשֵׁ֥ם <WH8034> u-ve-Shem [himself] by the name יִשְׂרָאֵ֖ל <WH3478> Yis-ra-'El of Israel יְכַנֶּֽה׃ <WH3655> ye-chan-Neh. and surname פ Peh

כֹּֽה־ <WH3541> koh- Thus אָמַ֨ר <WH559> 'a-Mar Thus saith יְהוָ֧ה <WH3068> Yah-weh the LORD מֶֽלֶךְ־ <WH4428> Me-lech- the King יִשְׂרָאֵ֛ל <WH3478> Yis-ra-'El of Israel וְגֹאֲל֖וֹ <WH1350> ve-go-'a-Lo and his redeemer יְהוָ֣ה <WH3068> Yah-weh the LORD צְבָא֑וֹת <WH6635> tze-va-'ot; of hosts אֲנִ֤י <WH589> 'a-Ni I am רִאשׁוֹן֙ <WH7223> ri-shOn I [am] the first וַאֲנִ֣י <WH589> va-'a-Ni and I אַחֲר֔וֹן <WH314> a-cha-Ron, and I [am] the last וּמִבַּלְעָדַ֖י <WH1107> u-mib-bal-'a-Dai and beside אֵ֥ין <WH369> 'ein and there אֱלֹהִֽים׃ <WH430> E-lo-Him. me [there is] no God

וּמִֽי־ <WH4310> u-mi- Who כָמ֣וֹנִי <WH3644> cha-Mo-ni is like יִקְרָ֗א <WH7121> yik-Ra, And who as I shall call וְיַגִּידֶ֤הָ <WH5046> ve-yag-gi-De-ha and shall declare וְיַעְרְכֶ֙הָ֙ <WH6186> ve-ya'-re-Che-ha it and set it in order לִ֔י Li, מִשּׂוּמִ֖י <WH7760> mis-su-Mi for me since I appointed עַם־ <WH5971> 'am- nation עוֹלָ֑ם <WH5769> o-Lam; the ancient וְאֹתִיּ֛וֹת <WH857> ve-'o-ti-Yot the things וַאֲשֶׁ֥ר <WH834> va-'a-Sher and תָּבֹ֖אנָה <WH935> ta-Vo-nah and shall come יַגִּ֥ידוּ <WH5046> yag-Gi-du let them shew לָֽמוֹ׃ la-mo.

אַֽל־ <WH408> 'al- not תִּפְחֲדוּ֙ <WH6342> tif-cha-Du Fear וְאַל־ <WH408> ve-'al- nay תִּרְה֔וּ <WH7297> tir-Hu, be afraid הֲלֹ֥א <WH3808> ha-Lo not מֵאָ֛ז <WH227> me-'Az thee from that time הִשְׁמַעְתִּ֥יךָ <WH8085> hish-ma'-Ti-cha have not I told וְהִגַּ֖דְתִּי <WH5046> ve-hig-Gad-ti and have declared וְאַתֶּ֣ם <WH859> ve-'at-Tem and you עֵדָ֑י <WH5707> 'e-Dai; [it];ye [are] even my witnesses הֲיֵ֤שׁ <WH3426> ha-Yesh Is there אֱל֙וֹהַּ֙ <WH433> e-Lo-ah a God מִבַּלְעָדַ֔י <WH1107> mib-bal-'a-Dai, beside וְאֵ֥ין <WH369> ve-'Ein is there צ֖וּר <WH6697> tzur me;yea [there is] no God בַּל־ <WH1077> bal- lest יָדָֽעְתִּי׃ <WH3045> ya-Da-'e-ti. I know

יֹֽצְרֵי־ <WH3335> yo-tze-rei- They that make פֶ֤סֶל <WH6459> Fe-sel a graven image כֻּלָּם֙ <WH3605> kul-Lam are all תֹּ֔הוּ <WH8414> To-hu, [are] all of them vanity וַחֲמוּדֵיהֶ֖ם <WH2530> va-cha-mu-dei-Hem and their delectable things בַּל־ <WH1077> bal- no יוֹעִ֑ילוּ <WH3276> yo-'I-lu; shall not profit וְעֵדֵיהֶ֣ם <WH5707> ve-'e-dei-Hem and they [are] their own witnesses הֵׅ֗מָּׅהׅ <WH1992> Hem-mah, like בַּל־ <WH1077> bal- fail יִרְא֛וּ <WH7200> yir-'U they see וּבַל־ <WH1077> u-val- fail יֵדְע֖וּ <WH3045> ye-de-'U not nor know לְמַ֥עַן <WH4616> le-Ma-'an so יֵבֹֽשׁוּ׃ <WH954> ye-Vo-shu. that they may be ashamed

מִֽי־ <WH4310> mi- Who יָצַ֥ר <WH3335> ya-Tzar Who hath formed אֵ֖ל <WH410> 'el a god וּפֶ֣סֶל <WH6459> u-Fe-sel a graven image נָסָ֑ךְ <WH5258> na-Sach; or molten לְבִלְתִּ֖י <WH1115> le-vil-Ti to no הוֹעִֽיל׃ <WH3276> ho-'Il. [that] is profitable

הֵ֤ן <WH2005> hen Behold כָּל־ <WH3605> kol- all חֲבֵרָיו֙ <WH2270> cha-ve-Rav Behold all his fellows יֵבֹ֔שׁוּ <WH954> ye-Vo-shu, shall be ashamed וְחָרָשִׁ֥ים <WH2796> ve-cha-ra-Shim and the workmen הֵ֖מָּה <WH1992> Hem-mah themselves מֵֽאָדָ֑ם <WH120> me-'a-Dam; they [are] of men יִֽתְקַבְּצ֤וּ <WH6908> yit-kab-be-Tzu let them all be gathered together כֻלָּם֙ <WH3605> chul-Lam all יַֽעֲמֹ֔דוּ <WH5975> ya-'a-Mo-du, let them stand up יִפְחֲד֖וּ <WH6342> yif-cha-Du [yet] they shall fear יֵבֹ֥שׁוּ <WH954> ye-Vo-shu [and] they shall be ashamed יָֽחַד׃ <WH3162> Ya-chad. together

חָרַ֤שׁ <WH2796> cha-Rash shapes בַּרְזֶל֙ <WH1270> bar-Zel iron מַֽעֲצָ֔ד <WH4621> ma-'a-Tzad, with the tongs וּפָעַל֙ <WH6466> u-fa-'Al both worketh בַּפֶּחָ֔ם <WH6352> bap-pe-Cham, in the coals וּבַמַּקָּב֖וֹת <WH4717> u-vam-mak-ka-Vot it with hammers יִצְּרֵ֑הוּ <WH3335> yitz-tze-Re-hu; and fashioneth וַיִּפְעָלֵ֙הוּ֙ <WH6466> vai-yif-'a-Le-hu and worketh בִּזְר֣וֹעַ <WH2220> biz-Ro-a' of his arms כֹּח֔וֹ <WH3581> ko-Cho, it with the strength גַּם־ <WH1571> gam- also רָעֵב֙ <WH7456> ra-'Ev gets וְאֵ֣ין <WH369> ve-'Ein faileth כֹּ֔חַ <WH3581> Ko-ach, and his strength לֹא־ <WH3808> lo- no שָׁ֥תָה <WH8354> Sha-tah he drinketh מַ֖יִם <WH4325> Ma-yim no water וַיִּיעָֽף׃ <WH3286> vai-yi-'Af. and is faint

חָרַ֣שׁ <WH2790> cha-Rash altogether עֵצִים֮ <WH6086> 'e-Tzim wood נָ֣טָה <WH5186> Na-tah stretcheth out קָו֒ <WH6957> kav [his] rule יְתָאֲרֵ֣הוּ <WH8388> ye-ta-'a-Re-hu he marketh it out בַשֶּׂ֔רֶד <WH8279> vas-Se-red, with a line יַעֲשֵׂ֙הוּ֙ <WH6213> ya-'a-Se-hu he fitteth בַּמַּקְצֻע֔וֹת <WH4741> bam-mak-tzu-'ot, it with planes וּבַמְּחוּגָ֖ה <WH4230> u-vam-me-chu-Gah with the compass יְתָאֳרֵ֑הוּ <WH8388> ye-to-'o-Re-hu; and he marketh it out וַֽיַּעֲשֵׂ֙הוּ֙ <WH6213> vai-ya-'a-Se-hu and maketh כְּתַבְנִ֣ית <WH8403> ke-tav-Nit it after the figure אִ֔ישׁ <WH376> 'Ish, of a man כְּתִפְאֶ֥רֶת <WH8597> ke-tif-'E-ret according to the beauty אָדָ֖ם <WH120> 'a-Dam of a man לָשֶׁ֥בֶת <WH3427> la-She-vet that it may remain בָּֽיִת׃ <WH1004> Ba-yit. in the house

לִכְרָת־ <WH3772> lich-rot- He heweth him down ל֣וֹ lo אֲרָזִ֔ים <WH730> 'a-ra-Zim, cedars וַיִּקַּ֤ח <WH3947> vai-yik-Kach and taketh תִּרְזָה֙ <WH8645> tir-Zah the cypress וְאַלּ֔וֹן <WH437> ve-'al-Lon, and the oak וַיְאַמֶּץ־ <WH553> vay-'am-metz- which he strengtheneth ל֖וֹ lo בַּעֲצֵי־ <WH6086> ba-'a-tzei- for himself among the trees יָ֑עַר <WH3293> Ya-'ar; of the forest נָטַ֥ע <WH5193> na-Ta' he planteth אֹ֖רֶן <WH766> 'O-ren an ash וְגֶ֥שֶׁם <WH1653> ve-Ge-shem and the rain יְגַדֵּֽל׃ <WH1431> ye-gad-Del. doth nourish

וְהָיָ֤ה <WH1961> ve-ha-Yah becomes לְאָדָם֙ <WH120> le-'a-Dam Then shall it be for a man לְבָעֵ֔ר <WH1197> le-va-'Er, to burn וַיִּקַּ֤ח <WH3947> vai-yik-Kach for he will take מֵהֶם֙ <WH1992> me-Hem of them וַיָּ֔חָם <WH2552> vai-Ya-chom, thereof and warm אַף־ <WH637> 'af- also יַשִּׂ֖יק <WH5400> yas-Sik himself yea he kindleth וְאָ֣פָה <WH644> ve-'A-fah [it] and baketh לָ֑חֶם <WH3899> La-chem; bread אַף־ <WH637> 'af- also יִפְעַל־ <WH6466> yif-'al- yea he maketh אֵל֙ <WH410> 'el a god וַיִּשְׁתָּ֔חוּ <WH7812> vai-yish-Ta-chu, and worshippeth עָשָׂ֥הוּ <WH6213> 'a-Sa-hu [it] he maketh פֶ֖סֶל <WH6459> Fe-sel it a graven image וַיִּסְגָּד־ <WH5456> vai-yis-god- and falleth down לָֽמוֹ׃ la-mo.

חֶצְיוֹ֙ <WH2677> chetz-Yo part שָׂרַ֣ף <WH8313> sa-Raf He burneth בְּמוֹ־ <WH1119> be-mov- thereof in אֵ֔שׁ <WH784> 'Esh, the fire עַל־ <WH5921> 'al- over חֶצְיוֹ֙ <WH2677> chetz-Yo with part בָּשָׂ֣ר <WH1320> ba-Sar flesh יֹאכֵ֔ל <WH398> yo-Chel, thereof he eateth יִצְלֶ֥ה <WH6740> yitz-Leh he roasteth צָלִ֖י <WH6748> tza-Li roast וְיִשְׂבָּ֑ע <WH7646> ve-yis-Ba'; and is satisfied אַף־ <WH637> 'af- also יָחֹם֙ <WH2552> ya-Chom yea he warmeth וְיֹאמַ֣ר <WH559> ve-yo-Mar [himself] and saith הֶאָ֔ח <WH1889> he-'Ach, Aha חַמּוֹתִ֖י <WH2552> cham-mo-Ti I am warm רָאִ֥יתִי <WH7200> ra-'I-ti I have seen אֽוּר׃ <WH217> 'Ur. the fire

וּשְׁאֵ֣רִית֔וֹ <WH7611> u-she-'E-ri-To, And the residue לְאֵ֥ל <WH410> le-'El a god עָשָׂ֖ה <WH6213> 'a-Sah thereof he maketh לְפִסְל֑וֹ <WH6459> le-fis-Lo; [even] his graven image; יִסְגֹּוד־ yis-goyd- כיִסְגָּד־ <WH5456> yis-god- falls ל֤וֹ <WH5456> lo he falleth down קוְיִשְׁתַּ֙חוּ֙ <WH7812> ve-yish-Ta-chu unto it and worshippeth וְיִתְפַּלֵּ֣ל <WH6419> ve-yit-pal-Lel [it] and prayeth אֵלָ֔יו <WH413> 'e-Lav, to וְיֹאמַר֙ <WH559> ve-yo-Mar unto it and saith הַצִּילֵ֔נִי <WH5337> hatz-tzi-Le-ni, Deliver כִּ֥י <WH3588> ki for אֵלִ֖י <WH410> 'e-Li me for thou [art] my god אָֽתָּה׃ <WH859> 'At-tah. you

לֹ֥א <WH3808> lo nor יָדְע֖וּ <WH3045> ya-de-'U They have not known וְלֹ֣א <WH3808> ve-Lo nor יָבִ֑ינוּ <WH995> ya-Vi-nu; nor understood כִּ֣י <WH3588> ki for טַ֤ח <WH2902> tach for he hath shut מֵֽרְאוֹת֙ <WH7200> me-re-'Ot that they cannot see עֵֽינֵיהֶ֔ם <WH5869> 'ei-nei-Hem, their eyes מֵהַשְׂכִּ֖יל <WH7919> me-has-Kil that they cannot understand לִבֹּתָֽם׃ <WH3826> lib-bo-Tam. [and] their hearts

וְלֹא־ <WH3808> ve-lo- No יָשִׁ֣יב <WH7725> ya-Shiv And none considereth אֶל־ <WH413> 'el- in לִבּ֗וֹ <WH3820> lib-Bo, in his heart וְלֹ֨א <WH3808> ve-Lo nor דַ֥עַת <WH1847> Da-'at neither [is there] knowledge וְלֹֽא־ <WH3808> ve-lo- nor תְבוּנָה֮ <WH8394> te-vu-Nah nor understanding לֵאמֹר֒ <WH559> le-Mor to say חֶצְי֞וֹ <WH2677> chetz-Yo part שָׂרַ֣פְתִּי <WH8313> sa-Raf-ti I have burned בְמוֹ־ <WH1119> ve-mov- of it in אֵ֗שׁ <WH784> 'Esh, the fire וְ֠אַף <WH637> Ve-'af and also אָפִ֤יתִי <WH644> 'a-Fi-ti yea also I have baked עַל־ <WH5921> 'al- over גֶּחָלָיו֙ <WH1513> ge-cha-Lav upon the coals לֶ֔חֶם <WH3899> Le-chem, bread אֶצְלֶ֥ה <WH6740> 'etz-Leh thereof I have roasted בָשָׂ֖ר <WH1320> va-Sar flesh וְאֹכֵ֑ל <WH398> ve-'o-Chel; and eaten וְיִתְרוֹ֙ <WH3499> ve-yit-Ro the residue לְתוֹעֵבָ֣ה <WH8441> le-to-'e-Vah an abomination אֶעֱשֶׂ֔ה <WH6213> 'e-'e-Seh, [it] and shall I make לְב֥וּל <WH944> le-Vul to the stock עֵ֖ץ <WH6086> 'etz of wood אֶסְגּֽוֹד׃ <WH5456> es-God. fall

רֹעֶ֣ה <WH7462> ro-'Eh He feedeth אֵ֔פֶר <WH665> 'E-fer, on ashes לֵ֥ב <WH3820> lev heart הוּתַ֖ל <WH2048> hu-Tal a deceived הִטָּ֑הוּ <WH5186> hit-Ta-hu; hath turned him aside וְלֹֽא־ <WH3808> ve-lo- cannot יַצִּ֤יל <WH5337> yatz-Tzil that he cannot deliver אֶת־ <WH853> 'et- נַפְשׁוֹ֙ <WH5315> naf-Sho his soul וְלֹ֣א <WH3808> ve-Lo nor יֹאמַ֔ר <WH559> yo-Mar, nor say הֲל֥וֹא <WH3808> ha-Lo nor שֶׁ֖קֶר <WH8267> She-ker [Is there] not a lie בִּימִינִֽי׃ <WH3225> bi-mi-Ni. my right ס sa-Mek
